definition: Four Sacred Mountains of Buddhism, namely: Mt Wutai 五臺山|五台山 in Shanxi, Mt Emei 峨眉山 in Sichuan, Mt Jiuhua 九華山|九华山 in Anhui, Mt Potala 普陀山 in Zhejiang
pinyin: Si4 da4 Fo2 jiao4 Ming2 shan1

sentences.english: Indian soldiers at the Buddhist monastery in Tawang, India, in June.
sentences.chinese: 6月的达旺，印度士兵在一所佛教寺院中。

sentences.english: This concept is one of the fundamental doctrines in Buddhism and Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 这一概念是佛教和印度教最基本的教义之一。

sentences.english: If Buddhism is supporting me, how am I going to repay the Buddha's kindness?
sentences.chinese: 若是佛教护持我，我应如何去报答佛恩？

sentences.english: In my understanding, Buddhism is a multi-cultural social education.
sentences.chinese: 我的理解是，佛教是一种多元文化的社会教育。

sentences.english: Ordained Buddhist monk aged 18 – 35 of all nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 不限国籍，年龄为18至35岁的佛教比丘。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Sri Lanka became the centre of the earlier Theravada order of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，斯里兰卡成了佛教早期派别上座部的中心。

sentences.english: This thesis made a research on the transmissive subject of early Buddhism in China from the transmissive perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本文从传播学角度对佛教早期在华传教主体进行研究。

sentences.english: Mr White has converted to Buddhism.
Thangkas are paintings created to support Buddhist practice.
sentences.chinese: 唐卡画的做法是创建以支持佛教。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism Tangka art has a long history and superb techniques.
sentences.chinese: 藏传佛教的唐卡艺术历史悠久，技艺精湛。

sentences.english: After listening the Buddhist music, the pains and troubles disappear and the heart regains the equanimity.
sentences.chinese: 佛教音乐使人听闻之下烦恼顿消，内心趋于平静。

sentences.english: The refuge in the buddhist or says buddhists.
sentences.chinese: 皈依三宝的人是佛教徒或称佛弟子。

sentences.english: Thangka handed down mostly works of Tibetan Buddhism and Bon.
sentences.chinese: 传世唐卡大都是藏传佛教和苯教作品。

sentences.english: One branch of western philosophy, Existentialism, is very similar to Buddhist ideas.
sentences.chinese: 而西方哲学的旁支，存在主义，同佛教十分相似。

sentences.english: Mount Wutai in China as one of the four famous Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 五台山为我国四大佛教名山之一。

sentences.english: I wish Buddhaholy and the Tasmanian Buddhist community all the very best into the future.
sentences.chinese: 我祝愿佛圣及塔斯曼尼亚佛教团体在未来一切都很好。

definition: Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism/Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)
